package.description: 內嵌合併衝突的醒目提式與命令。
package.config.title: 合併衝突
package.config.autoNavigateNextConflictEnabled: 是否在解決合併衝突後自動導覽至下一個合併衝突。
package.config.codeLensEnabled: 為編輯器內的合併衝突區塊建立 Code Lens。
package.config.decoratorsEnabled: 為編輯器內的合併衝突區塊建立裝飾項目。
package.config.diffViewPosition: Controls where the diff view should be opened when comparing changes in merge conflicts.
package.config.diffViewPosition.current: Open the diff view in the current editor group.
package.config.diffViewPosition.beside: Open the diff view next to the current editor group.
package.config.diffViewPosition.below: Open the diff view below the current editor group.

out/commandHandler.cursorNotInConflict: 編輯器游標不在衝突合併範圍之內
out/commandHandler.cursorOnCommonAncestorsRange: 編輯器游標在共同上階區塊內，請移動至「當前項目」或「來源項目」區塊
out/commandHandler.cursorOnSplitterRange: 編輯器游標在衝突合併工具範圍內,請移動至"當前項目"或來源項目"區塊
out/commandHandler.noConflicts: 檔案內找不到需要合併衝突項目
out/commandHandler.noOtherConflictsInThisFile: 此檔案內沒有其他的衝突合併項目
